message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll love!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
